tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Friendliness: Dr. Chavvi  was incredibly warm and approachable. From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed and heard. They took the time to listen to all my concerns and addressed them with empathy and understanding.  explanations were clear and concise. They took the time to break down complex medical jargon into terms I could easily understand.  They were thorough in their approach and made sure to involve me in the decision-making process every step of the way.  Their expertise and dedication to patient care were evident throughout the entire process, making every penny spent well worth it. I was pleasantly surprised by the minimal wait time  and I was seen promptly at my scheduled time.  just wanted to highlight that my A1c was 9 and it has come down to 6. i strongly suggest to those who have diabetes
reply_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I recently had an appointment with Dr. Shalini for diabetes reversal, and I am thrilled with the results. Before my treatment, my HBA1c levels were quite high at 8.5%. After following Dr. Shalini's comprehensive plan, my HBA1c levels have significantly dropped to 6.2%.

Dr. Shalini's expertise and personalized approach were instrumental in this improvement. The staff at the clinic were always welcoming and supportive, making each visit pleasant and stress-free. The clinic itself is well-equipped and maintains a high standard of cleanliness and professionalism.

I highly recommend Dr. Shalini and her clinic for anyone seeking effective diabetes management and reversal.
reply_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your valuable feedback.

The healthcare providers took the time to explain each procedure and answer my questions, ensuring I felt informed and at ease throughout the process. This experience has given me peace of mind regarding my health, and I highly recommend a well-woman check-up to every woman. It's an empowering step towards maintaining one's overall well-being.

review: Got to know about Dr. Shalini from friend whose family is successfully recovered from Covid 19 under treatment of the doctor.My whole family was infected with Covid 19 and It was a wise decision i took to go with Dr. Shalini.Met a fabulous doctor at the right time. She is friendly, caring, listens carefully to all our concerns and clarifies all our queries.She prescribed relevant tests and right medications at right time for covid as per the guidelines. She is always available on phone/whatsapp and responds to messages. She took extra step and helped me in admitting to hospital when my oxygen level dropped. She is saviour of our lives.Thank you doctor for all your support and care when needed. At last we found a good caring family doctor in Bangalore. I strongly recommend Dr. Shalini for any health issues. I referred doctor to my neighbour and got the same positive feedback from them also.

My appointment with Dr Shalini was great. She was friendly, took time to understand my issues and hear me out, explained the possibilities clearly and answered my questions in detail. She gave me a clear course of action to go ahead with, and it worked for me. Would definitely visit again in case i need any medical care in the future.
